title: Elementary Teacher Design Expertise Development Program Based on an Ecological Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic lesson design experience and science curriculum knowledge
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing the design of science education materials using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can deconstruct science curriculum-tailored lesson design processes into three or more phases based on an ecological framework
Learners can create learning materials that visually and interactively represent scientific concepts using digital tools
Learners can apply iterative improvement protocols to enhance existing lesson designs incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
